title: Ebook edits
author: VD
content_html: We’re getting closer to putting the three Eternal Warriors ebooks up on Amazon. They’ll probably be sold for $1.99 each, as that appears to be Amazon’s preferred price. However, while the cover for Shadow is being prepared, it occurs to me that it might not be a bad idea to use the time fresh eyes to check for typos and formatting mishaps in the epubs that have been prepared, so if you’re interested in reading through one of them and taking the relevant notes, please let me know and specify which book you’d like to check, The War in Heaven, The World in Shadow, or The Wrath of Angels.
